attributes.action: In the absence of EU membership Britain should join EFTA and the EEA agreement
attributes.additional_details:
More on EFTA and the EEA agreement here:

http://www.efta.int/
attributes.background: In order to safeguard its economy and partnerships Britain should join EFTA ( European Free Trade Association) and sign up to the EEA agreement. This will guarantee access to the single market and freedom of movement across the EU and EFTA (Liechtenstein, Iceland, Norway and Switzerland).
